LANGUAGE.description: Button that indicates the current language of the program, represented by a flag

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_FULLSCREEN.description: Located in the upper right corner, enlarges the window across the entire screen

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_RESTORE.description: Same button as Fullscreen, restores the window to it's previous dimension

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_MINIMIZE.description: Located in the upper right corner, reduces the window to a small title and hide its contents

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_ABOUT.description: Located in the help menu, displays informations about the application

WORKSPACE_PROJECT_NOTEBOOK.description: Tool for project management and task management

WORKSPACE_BOARD_CONNECT.message: Sélectionnez un appareil pour se connecter à lui

WORKSPACE_PROJECT_LIBRARY.description: Button that opens a modal with all the projects, with a folder icon as pictogram

WORKSPACE_STATUS_DISCONNECTED.description: Status of a device that is not connected.

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_EXIT_QUESTION.description: Select if you are sure you want to exit

EXIT.description: A button with the text exit

WORKSPACE_DOCUMENTATION.description: Open a new window with the documentation of Wyliodrin STUDIO

WORKSPACE_SET_MODE_ADVANCED.description: The menu to set the editor in advanced mode

WORKSPACE_SET_MODE_SIMPLE.description: The menu to set the editor in simple mode

ABOUT_DEVELOPED_BY.description: Text for authors of Wyliodrin Studio

WORKSPACE_DEVICE_SETUP_TEXT.message: Vous voudrez peut-être configurer certains appareils. Pour plus d'informations, consultez notre site Web de tutoriels.
WORKSPACE_DEVICE_SETUP_TEXT.description: The message the user gets if there are no devices available in the connection selection

WORKSPACE_DEVICE_SETUP.description: The devices setup button for the setup website

CHAT_JOIN_CHANNEL.description: Button used to connect to a channel.

CHAT_NEW_CHANNEL.description: The name of the new channel

CHAT_WELCOME_ADD_CHANNEL.description: Text used when the user wants to add a new channel

CHAT_TEXT_PART_CHANNEL.message: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir quitter ce channel?
CHAT_TEXT_PART_CHANNEL.description: Text of prompt that show up when the user wants to leave a channel.

CHAT_TAKEN_NAME.message: Your nickname is already in use. It has been changed to {nickName}
CHAT_TAKEN_NAME.description: Text of notification that shows up when the user tries to use a nickname already taken.

CHAT_COULD_NOT_JOIN_CHANNEL.message: Ce channel n'a pas pu être rejoint! Veuillez en choisir un autre!
CHAT_COULD_NOT_JOIN_CHANNEL.description: Text of notification that shows up when the user can not connect to a certain channel

CHAT_TITLE_DISCONNECT.description: Title of the prompt that show up when the user wants to disconnect from the server

CHAT_TEXT_DISCONNECT.message: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir vous déconnecter du serveur?
CHAT_TEXT_DISCONNECT.description: Text of the prompt that show up when the user wants to disconnect from the server

CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_MESSAGE.message: S'il vous plaît tapez un message!
CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_MESSAGE.description: Notification text when the user didn't write a message.

CHAT_TITLE_WARNING.description: Title of prompt that show up when the user wants to leave a channel.

CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_NAME.message: S'il vous plaît tapez un nom de chaîne!
CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_NAME.description: Warning when the user didn't choose a channel name.

CHAT_LOGIN_TITLE.description: Text when the user is connecting to a server.

DASHBOARD_VIEWER_ERASE_GRAPH.description: Button used to delete a graph

DEVICE_CONNECT.description: Button used to connect to a device

DEVICE_SERIAL_OPTIONS.description: The title of the serial device options dialog

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_INSTANCE_RESET_TI.description: The title of the question dialog the user sees when there is another connection with his id

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_INSTANCE_RESET.description: The question dialog text the user sees when there is another instance connected with his id

WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_NEW_DEVICE_TITLE.description: The title of the dialog with instructions on how to add a new device

WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_NEW_DEVICE_NAME.description: The name of the device with instructions on how to add a new device

WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_NEW_DEVICE_NAME_NOT_VALI.message: Veuillez entrer un nom de périphérique valide
WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_NEW_DEVICE_NAME_NOT_VALI.description: The message the user receives when he did not enter a valid name for a new device

DOCUMENTATION.description: Open a new window with the documentation of Wyliodrin STUDIO

TOOLBAR_RESISTOR_COLOR_CODE.description: Option in the Help Menu which opens a dialog that makes a connection between the color of a resistor and it's value

RESISTOR_COLORCODE_FROM_COLOR_TO_NUMBER.description: Options that transforms the color in a value

RESISTOR_COLORCODE_FROM_NUMBER_TO_COLOR.description: Option that transforms the value in a color

RESISTOR_COLORCODE_STRIPES.description: Number of stripes in the resistor

RESISTOR_COLORCODE_RESISTANCE.description: Label for the value of the resistance

SEND_FEEDBACK_TITLE.description: Option in the Help Menu to send a feedback

SEND_FEEDBACK_MESSAGE.description: Label of the input text area of the feedback

SEND_FEEDBACK_SEND.description: Button used to send the feecback

FEEDBACK_SCREENSHOT_ERROR.message: Une erreur s'est produite lors de la capture de la page! Veuillez réessayer.
FEEDBACK_SCREENSHOT_ERROR.description: Notification that shows up when  the system can't take a screenshot

SEND_FEEDBACK_CANCEL.description: Button to close the feedback dialog

REAL_FS_DO_NOT_EXIST_FS.message: Le système de fichiers donné est introuvable! Veuillez utiliser un système de fichiers valide.
REAL_FS_DO_NOT_EXIST_FS.description: This is the text of an error that shows up when the chosen filesystem is not valid.

REAL_FS_ALREADY_REGISTERED_FS.message: Le système de fichiers donné est déjà enregistré!
REAL_FS_ALREADY_REGISTERED_FS.description: This is the text of a warning when the chosen filesystem was registered before.

REAL_FS_NO_DEF_FS.message: Aucun système de fichiers par défaut, y a-t-il un système de fichiers enregistré?
REAL_FS_NO_DEF_FS.description: This is the text of an error displayed when there is no default filesystem registered.

WELCOME_START_WORK.message: Vous pouvez commencer à créer de nouvelles applications, à configurer et à connecter des cartes ou à importer vos propres projets..

WELCOME_CREATE_APP.description: Button that will redirect the user to a popup where he can create new applicatons.

WELCOME_CONNECT_BOARD.description: Button that will open a browser window with a documentation chapter regarding the setup of a Raspberry Pi board.

PROJECT_NOTEBOOK.description: The Notebook Tab, where the user can take it's own notes

NOTEBOOK_SELECT_IMAGE_ERROR.description: Notification error that shows up when the user didn't choose an image to load

NOTEBOOK_SELECT_FILE_ERROR.description: Notification error that shows up when the user didn't choose a file to load

NOTEBOOK_DELETE_ITEM_QUESTION.message: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer cet élément?
NOTEBOOK_DELETE_ITEM_QUESTION.description: Confirmation prompt which ensures that the user really wants to delete the current notebook element

NOTEBOOK_DELETE_ITEM_TITLE.description: Title of the delete confirmation prompt

NOTEBOOK_LOAD_DATA_ERROR.description: This error shwos up when notebook.json can't be parsed.

PROJECT_NEW_FOLDER.description: Create a folder within a project

PROJECT_NEW_FILE.description: Create a file within a project

PROJECT_HIDE_CONSOLE.description: Button designed to hide the console

PROJECT_WELCOME_CREATE_NEW_APP.description: Button to create a new project within the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_IMPORT.description: Import a project from an archive

PROJECT_LIBRARY_EXPORT.description: Export a project from the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_RENAME.description: Rename a project within the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_DELETE.description: Delete a project within the workspace

PROJECTS_NO_PROJECT.message: Vous n'avez pas encore de projets.
PROJECTS_NO_PROJECT.description: Message displayed in the Projects Library when the list of projects is empty.

PROJECTS_CREATE_APPLICATION.message: Cliquez sur le bouton "Créer une nouvelle application" ci-dessous
PROJECTS_CREATE_APPLICATION.description: Message displayed in the Projects Library when the list of projects is empty.

PROJECTS_STORAGE_NOT_PERSISTENT.message: Le système de stockage n'est pas persistant. Cela signifie que vos projets peuvent être supprimés à tout moment sans préavis. Pour éviter cela, exportez fréquemment vos projets.
PROJECTS_STORAGE_NOT_PERSISTENT.description: The message the user sees in the Projects Library when persistent storage is not available. We recommend you to use Firefox.

PROJECTS_STORAGE_ASK_PERSISTENT.message: Le système de stockage n'est pas persistant. Veuillez autoriser rendre le stockage persistant.
PROJECTS_STORAGE_ASK_PERSISTENT.description: The message the user sees in the Projects Library when persistent storage is available but not permitted.

PROJECTS_STORAGE_BUTTON_ASK_PERSISTENT.description: The button the user clicks to ask persistance.

PROJECTS_STORAGE_BROWSER_ERROR.message: Si votre navigateur ne vous demande pas d'autoriser la persistance, il s'agit d'un problème avec votre navigateur. Pour éviter de perdre vos projets, vous devez ajouter ce site Web aux bookmarks, l’utiliser souvent et exporter fréquemment vos projets. Nous vous recommandons également d'utiliser Firefox.
PROJECTS_STORAGE_BROWSER_ERROR.description: The message the user sees in the Projects Library when persistent storage is not available.

PROJECTS_DELETE_FOLDER.description: Delete a folder within a project

PROJECT_RENAME_FOLDER.description: Rename a folder within a project

PROJECT_IMPORT_FILE.description: Import a file within a project

PROJECT_DELETE_FILE.description: Delete a file within a project

PROJECT_RENAME_FILE.description: Rename a file within a project

PROJECT_EXPORT_FILE.description: Export a file from the project

DELETE_SCHEMATIC.description: Button used to delete a schematic

DELETE_MESSAGE.message: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce schéma?
